string.text: Documents with notes

The documents mention that pursuant to an order of Department 1, following the sealing of the transportation lock, the Pripyat 1 underpass was flooded with carbon dioxide mixed with some kind of chemical additive. Consequently, all staff were instructed to wear chemical protection suits with closed-cycle respiratory modules.
Letter concerning deliveries of item 62

"Due to anomalous activity, transportation of item 62 over open ground is not feasible. Use the underground Pripyat 1 underpass for delivery. The plan of delivery and subsequent sealing of the underpass has been sent to Department 1."
Folder with the order
The documents mention evacuation of the production complex from the Jupiter plant into underground laboratories. This matter was supposed to have been discussed in the laboratory section.
Delivery Schedule

"Schedule for deliveries of item 62: 07/14 - 20 units (one damaged); 07/21 - 32 units (2 damaged); 07/28 - 26 units (one damaged). The consignment note concerning losses en route has been sent to the plant administration, with a copy sent to the repair workshop."
Notebook Sheet
Following the meeting: all ulouse to focus on the activities of the evacuation of the industrial complex 'products ¹62'.
Duty Shift Log

"...18:30 - airtight sealing of all P-1 underpass sections complete. 19:00 - airtight sealing of railroad lock doors complete. Welding had to be used to seal the doors. 19:45 - transportation lock doors closed. Operation of the lock door mechanism required the activation of the backup generator, because the power to the underpass had already been cut. 20:00 - the chemical workshop has initiated flooding of the underpass with gas. 22:00 - work to seal the underpass has been completed, with all documents sent to Department 1."
Underpass Schematics

Pripyat 1 underpass schematics, which show that the underpass is under the city of Pripyat. The document has several notes: 1. Seal transportation lock doors. 2. Use gas from chemical workshop to seal underpass.
Altered Insulator
This item was once an electrical insulator. Now it is almost formed in the artifact with unstable properties. Most likely, it is a source of alternating psy-radiation.
A can of colophonium
Rosin bank used when soldering. A rare thing in the Zone: as a rule, part of the broken item here connect tape.
A pack of capacitors

A pack of capacitors - one of the basic electrical components around. They're not that rare in the Zone, as they're used for hi-tech equipment upgrades, but this sort of capacity is not normally required.
Textolite base

PCB - the basis of the printed circuit board. Sensations experienced amateur radio technician at the sight of untouched textolite plate, comparable only to the feelings of the writer over a blank sheet.
A box of transistors
A box of transistors - semiconductors that generate, transform and amplify electrical oscillation. Transistors are the dream of every radio technician in the Zone.
A roll of copper wire

A roll of copper wire is an excellent conductor and simultaneously a source of a base metal. Due to the latter, such wire is very rare in the Zone. All the reserves of this wire were found, melted and delivered to recycling centers back in the 90s.
Mutant detection scanner

Based on a regular anomalous activity scanner, this device is combined with a limited range mutant detection sensor and a recording component for storage of results. The device is equipped with an automatic deactivation switch that is fired when a certain amount of data has been collected.
Administrative documents

Folder with documents that contain purely administrative information. According to the latter, in connection with the order of the central laboratory of technical documentation for 'product ¹62' was transferred to the test shop.
Black's PDA

Among the few messages one attracted particular attention due to the nickname of the sender: The Jackal. 'My man in the Institute will recommend you the head of the expedition. Tom will have to take your kids to the protection of the bunker, it's great to facilitate the task. Remember: the customer wants no information on objects with the index 'X' in the hands of scientists is not horrible. If the leak anything, we are not beyond the area residents. Do not let me down, Black '.
Black Box
The Stingray 1 black box which survived the crash. It should contain details of the flight's last moments, albeit in encrypted format.
Plastic explosives standard army type. Equipped with a five-second timer.
Explosives with a timer
Altered Wheel
Snag's PDA
The PDA has a card with a note near the little station - clear cache - plus a pair of low-quality photographs of an erotic nature.
Bandit's PDA

The last message on the PDA reads: "Catch that Snag bastard and bring him to me - we are due for a heart-to-heart. I don't care where he is - just find him. If he puts up a fight - teach him a lesson. Sultan."

This PDA contains details of Morgan's clients, as well as the coordinates of Duty's secret warehouse from which he took weapons. Morgan then sold the weapons to mercenaries and also established contact with someone called Sultan. To cover his tracks, Morgan decided to leak the warehouse location to Freedom. His accomplice, Vulture, was supposed to convey this information. The PDA also mentions a sensor that only Morgan can disable, which will alert Duty if the stash is opened. This information is bound to be of interest to both Duty and Freedom.
Morgan's PDA

A note on the back of an old document: "Ghost, I'm taking my things. Thanks for the assault rifle - I'm going to need it. In exchange, I'm leaving you some of Doctor's medical supplies. I managed to trap the mercenary who was on my tail, so I'm not going to need them... I hope. I'm going to meet Fang now - he managed to put the decoder together. Let's meet at the usual place, if you can make it. Strelok."
A note to Ghost

A note on checkered paper: "Strelok, I've left the other decoder in our Pripyat stash just in case. Me and Ghost are heading to Agroprom, so we'll leave our extra ammo here. Take it if you need it. Happy hunting! Fang."
A note to Strelok

A note on the back of an old document: "Fang, I can't wait for you any longer - I've got a whole squad on my tail. I'm going to the sarcophagus on my own. I'll leave my lucky shooter here - I haven't got any more ammo for it anyway. If I don't make it back, give it to Ghost. If he takes care of the shooter, the shooter will take care of him. Take care. Strelok."
A note to Fang

The memory module is extracted from an unmanned intelligence apparatus. Technician unlock module by opening access to the information that has been collected scout. Among other things, it contains three beacon bearings.
Memory Module (unblocked)
A memory module from the UAV. Despite the crash, the module is fully operational, but unfortunately it is blocked.
Memory Module (blocked)

Old sheet of paper with the schedule of posts; bottom on it can be seen four digits: '1421'. Over old records marker is written: 'Lieutenant VI Sokolov In connection with the crash of the helicopter proceeded to the evacuation point B205. For two days, the evacuation did not take place, the continued presence on the point associated with unnecessary risk. Decided to leave the point and proceed to the mobile laboratory scientific expedition. The laboratory is located to the northeast of the point of evacuation. '
Sokolov's note
A plant that was part of a grove, which was partially transformed by anomalous activity. The grove reacted to the intrusion with aggression, but the plant does not appear to be dangerous so far.
Anomalous Plant

The last message received on the PDA is from Morgan. It is basically a contract for the assassination of a stalker called Degtyarev. The message has several photographs attached. Morgan's final instructions are to delete the message after reading.
Mercenary's PDA

This case combines an artifact detector, a battery and a powerful transmitter. The device will scan anomalies to determine the number and type of artifacts that appear. All of this information will be automatically relayed to the scientists' bunker.
Anomalous Activity Scanner

The last entry on a PDA - Sound: 
 '... wherever you go, every time that giveth the increase on the same place. Mist ... the damn impossible to get used ... Chepurnoy disappeared and meet. Strange. Maybe found a way out? .. 
 sixth day, the water went all crazy ... And Colonel: two shot and a bullet in the forehead ... I am now alone. One anomaly in this fucking ... And pulled me to arrange the same loss of communication with the staff! Could pick up, eh? Pension, cottage, fishing - and there would be no 'long' ... And the truth is, I wonder, as if everything turned! .. Only to hell. Captain tachenka already dead for a long time ... A general 'long' tachenka now gone, soon ... in the upper tundra, her mother ... in places rich in game ... so that's justice. ' 
 Next audible sound of the shot, the recording stops.
General Tachenko's PDA

The manual describes how to use 'product ¹62'. Especially emphasized that when aiming should not comply with anticipation to the amendment to the wind, as these parameters are irrelevant to the range of aimed fire. \n These documents must not fall into the wrong hands: they are clearly interested analysts SBU.
Manual for item 62

The notebook contains a detailed description of an experiment assessing a psy-field's effect on an object in another hemisphere. A group of scientists in the Caribbean received the signal, but it was distorted. The signal was altered in a strange way, as though corrected by someone. A possible explanation is that the noosphere theory is correct and the changes were made by the noosphere. \n These documents must not fall into anyone else's hands, as they would be of great interest to USS analysts.
A notebook with a description of an experiment

The document states the technical characteristics of the antenna and how they differ from predicted. On the reverse side is worth the mark - it shows that this documentation is framed in a lab X10. \n These documents must not fall into the wrong hands: they are clearly interested analysts SBU.
Rainbow emitter - main technical characteristics

The documents refer to one of the side discoveries of the research, specifically the discovery that living creatures are able to generate directed psy-emissions. A biological field emitter, essentially a giant brain, was grown as part of the research conducted in lab X16. \n These documents must not fall into anyone else's hands, as they would be of great interest to USS analysts.
Research documents

The report details the study of biological samples sent from lab X18. The samples were subjected to informational field effects of varying intensities. The report meticulously describes the mutation of living beings following exposure to emissions. \n These documents must not fall into anyone else's hands, as they would be of great interest to USS analysts.
Report on study of samples

The document refers to the transfer of the research team and all materials to another laboratory called X7, which will be used to research matters relating to the influence of the noosphere. The research team comprises: N.A. Lebedev, E.F. Kalancha and V.I. Suslov. \n These documents must not fall into anyone else's hands, as they would be of great interest to USS analysts.
Order of Transfer

The last note on the PDA reads: "I found the emergency generator on the sixth floor - the technical floor. It took two hours to get it working again. I'd love to turn it on, but Serbin ordered me to stay put until he brings some people in."
Barchuk's PDA
Magnetic key card in red. In one of the planes is applied 'X8'.
Red X8 keycard

The PDA contains many meaningless entries, but one stands out: The Monolith is communicating with the recipient of the message and ordering him to collect surplus ammunition and store it in locations unknown to the nonbelievers. These locations are to be marked with the mark of the Monolith. When difficult times come, those who hear the Monolith shall benefit from its wisdom... I have conveyed the will of the Monolith to my brothers and told them where to place the ammo..."
Monolith fighter's PDA
A children's toolkit. Unlikely to be suitable for fine work, but given the deficit of tools in the Zone, could be useful for a thrifty technician.
Tools for basic work
A decent set of tools. It looks like it was carefully put together by an experienced technician for his own use. Despite their age, the tools are in good condition.
Tools for fine work

Professional set of tools for fine finishing equipment. The inscription on the box says that the set was manufactured in the GDR. What is included in the kit, enough for almost any work on the setup and calibration.
Calibration tools
Old magnetic keycard
Cardan's magnetic keycard. Was used for access to the item 62 testing workshop.
Documents concerning item 62

Documentation, which describes the working principle and the basic performance characteristics of electromagnetic installation. 
 attached to a document note: 'The documentation must be returned to the laboratory X8, central. I'll be busy, to deliver himself. In the CCD 'Jubilee' please use a magnetic card to go down the elevator to the second floor minus, more will deal himself. Access card attached. 
 Lebedev '
 These documents must not fall into the wrong hands: they are clearly interested analysts SBU.
Yellow X8 keycard
Order No. 562
Internal order No. 423
Key A
Neutral view on the key marked only the letter 'A'
Key B
Neutral view on the key marked only the letter 'B'

Voice in one of the audio sounds particularly overwrought: 'Yeah, there you are, mutants fuevy! .. Climbed, then up, and you think Noah before you reach you? .. Hehe! Yes you are, I see do not know that I have a farm near the northern personal way ... Tryndets you bastards! '.
Noah's PDA

Among the many spam in your mailbox notebook contains a single message, flagged the importance of: \n 'Organize camp at the station recycling: anyone who is involved in the case, will be coming to you. Black do not wait: he and his men will be on the 'Jupiter', he has his own task. Military braked their flights in the zone, so that from them will not be trouble. When stalkers find a way to Pripyat, will send the Guide and will wait there for the people of the customer - they will show where the laboratory. \n Jackal '
Mercenary notebook

The last incoming message: \n 'While sticks out near some old shops. I sent two scout forward to you the way. But so far no-show courier from the customer, we will wait here: there is clearly fresher air. \n Slasher '
PDA of Hook the mercenary
PDA mercenary Ridge
A canister of a dangerous chemical nerve agent.
A canister of Perin B3 gas
The box is locked with a rather clever lock installed into it. Judging by its weight and the noise it makes when shaken, there's something inside.
Steel box

Note on the PDA: "I'm positive the artifact is on the tree itself. It's clear from here that I could climb onto the tree from the hill. I just hope the hills are free of mutants. It's too bad I had to come here on my own after that argument with Cardan and Barge, but when I bring back the artifact they'll see I was right all along..."
Joker's PDA

In the last entry on a PDA resentment: 'Cardan - old wino! How swell back of the chair can not tear - well, how 'there must be a better look' ... moron! More on us to hit the Joker - young we are, like, too, not a damn thing sech¸m x ... heh .. And Joker also good offense, grabbed my rucksack and - fyut! - Meet. While I calmed Cardano, dumped in an unknown direction. And to me that now, with the old idiot thump? And this vodka - shit ... PFC ... and it all started so cool! '
Barge's PDA

Record ¹12. Studies will soon be over ... The camp is already beginning to suspect something. Capercaillie agreed with Danilo go for bloodsuckers ... I wonder when they will guess ... It should be sort of blood banks: find out which ones are infected, and hide the rest ...[quickly:] Someone's coming.[Sound off, and then start recording]. Record number thirteen ... perhaps the last. All naperekos. At first this curious idiot hunter, and now grouse. It would be naive to expect that it will come down to me from the hands. They come for me. However ...[laughter] which, in essence, is the difference? Gemoglobinzavisimost soon eat me. Better to let the shot - it's better than dying from the disease.
Tremor’s PDA

Top Secret. Order ¹562 Chief of Defence Staff object ¹1 R. Yu Didenko. \n Unit chemical protection ¹423 Back to dislocation of the sector in the sector B103 A19, to field test chemical. mixture 'Perin B3' under particularly close to the fighting. Responsible for testing the unit commander Colonel PP Slavin. Responsible for transportation and security deputy. unit commander Lt. Col. KS Shafts.

Top Secret. Order from Colonel PP Slavin. 
 According to this order to familiarize the staff of chemical protection ulouse ¹423 with this information: 
 1. Keys to the container with a chemical mixture 'Perin B3' are available at: Colonel PP Slavin (key A), Lt. Col. KS Rolls (key B). 
 2. The procedure for the construction of columns, starting from the head of the column: Machine deputy. unit commander, machine maintenance ¹8, BTR ¹1, transport machine ¹1, BTR ¹3, escort car ¹2, machine unit commander PP Slavin. 
 copy of the order to hand over Lieutenant Colonel KS Shafts and Senior Lieutenant RB Nazarenko.
Magnetic key card is yellow, with marked on one of the planes with 'X8'. \n It should not fall into the wrong hands, because it allows you to get into the secret laboratory.
Sultan’s messenger’s PDA
The last message sent from the PDA - sound: 'Sultan, I vytsepil this rotten pigeons! .. Otgr¸b it from me to the full! Now for a long time, bitch, remember how kid vparivat bullshit! '.
At one time it was the steering wheel dredger, but now the sight of about half the generated artifact. Artifact rather unusual: the intensity of light, emits little - and all.

Incoming message reads: \n "I managed to arrange something about the weapons and that greedy bastard is going to sell us his faction's stock. It's gonna be fairly cheap but we’ll have to haul ass to Jupiter. \n Vulture.”
'Scanner gravity chemical symbiont'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 32.1351. Used by scientists to study the processes taking place in the gravel-chemical symbionts'
'Scanner chemical anomalies'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 27.7724. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the chemical anomalies'
'Scanner gravity anomaly'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 78.9835. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the gravity anomaly '
'Scanner thermal anomalies'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 47.3246. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the thermal anomaly '
'Scanner psi-static anomaly'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 06.8912. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the psy-static anomaly '
'Scanner Thermal symbiont'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 35.0205. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the thermal symbionts'
'Scanner electro-static anomaly'
'Specialized scanners abnormal activity of a series of 03.1392. Used by scientists to study the processes occurring in the electro-static anomaly '
'The concept ¹ IA38.1294'
'Special scheme settings anomaly detector. Contains data and the necessary formulas for calculations of frequency and phase response of the structural system. '
'Drawings for product sample ¹ 22.17'
'The drawings needed to build the device fine tuning APC structural system.'
'Note Homs'

'Entries hardly readable: '... their group of five people from the ship ..... put forward ... at the south-west ... today ... will be minus one, and then how it goes ... I goal of all .... will update ... as agreed ... a mole. ''
Flower Damon

Proiskhozhzheniya thermal artifact. Has a very peculiar structure. The shape of a flower. Radioactive. Many believe this artifact once beautiful legend, but wrong. Due to the instability often destroyed and transformed into a fireball. Information about the properties are contradictory.
PDA Goodwin
One of poslednimih records have been inflicted on the map mark the tour, as well as a few words about the camp of behavior seen on the route creatures. The remaining information is encrypted.
Note Goodwin

Illegible entry made in haste: 'hell kind of ... in the tunnel quite ploho..chto these people in black ... and the beast ... ak gone mad ... are kept by the party not try to attack, but as guard ... need to move quickly to the base. '
Case scientists
It contains the results of the study data psy-static anomalies.
Scheme gear
The principal documents and charts containing data for the assembly of reduction devices.
Drawings phased devices
Collected diagrams and drawings needed to build concepts phased devices.
Modular circuit
Schemes contain a highly mattered information to create and build a modular devices.
Documents Chekhov

Folder with documents svobodovskogo former leader stalker named Chekhov. Some records: 'Further progress deep into the center of the Zone are vital. The main forces should proceed to the Military, they will be headed by Lucas. It is necessary to gain a foothold on the point of the old military base. Loki with Egghead should send expeditionary ulouse in Limansk and further north in the vicinity of the station Yanov . The debt was up to something, but kamenschikov can not be dismissed ... '
Information about Scar

Documents Lucas, former deputy svobodovskogo and later leader of the clan Military, they are given information about the appearance in the Dark Valley stalker named Scar, and then followed by the events of the conflict Fremen and blue.
X-Ray/: X18/ Top Secret
There is a special dotuments about one of the secret lab X18. Some more inormation about any experiments of schientists groups "O-Soznanie"
Scanner frequencies
Special low-frequency scanner that finding and fixing readings APC signal.
Folder Sultan
Folder with documents part of the bandit leader Sultan. Contain information on the supply in different zones in smuggled goods.
Overhead Sultan
Documents with different records on consignment illegally imported goods into the Zone.
Supply routes
Supply chain, freight and false documents smugglers operating in the zone.
Special Tools
Spets set of tools destined for dismantling electronic equipment.
Transformer Module
Module in the electronics and circuits. Contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from your old factory equipment. Type 48-14.
Generating unit
Module in the electronics and circuits. Contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from your old factory equipment. Type 72-12.
Electronic module
Module in the electronics and circuits. Contains some important technical indicators and shot settings from your old factory equipment. Type 21-27.
